workflow.name: Create marketing content with voice commands using GPT-4 & AI tools in Telegram
workflow.description:
How It Works ‚Äì Your AI Marketing Team in Action
This automation acts as your AI-powered content and image marketing assistant inside Telegram. With just a voice note or text message, it can:

üß† Understand your request
‚Äì Whether you send a message or speak into Telegram, it transcribes and processes your input using GPT-4.

üé® Create and edit content
‚Äì Based on what you say, it can generate:

‚úçÔ∏è Blog posts

üíº LinkedIn posts

üé¨ Faceless videos

üñºÔ∏è AI-generated images

ü™Ñ Edits to existing images

üîé Searches through your image database

üí¨ Replies directly in Telegram
‚Äì It sends you back the result‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs a post, image, or video link‚Äîwithout leaving the app.

üß© Built using LangChain agent logic
‚Äì It intelligently chooses the right tool from a suite of sub-workflows like "Create Image", "Blog Post", or "Video" using agent reasoning.

üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps ‚Äì Get Started in Minutes!
‚åõ Time Estimate: ~15‚Äì30 minutes (faster if you're familiar with n8n)

üîó 1. Import the Template Pack
üì• Download and install these workflows into your n8n:

Create Image, Edit Image, Search Images

Blog Post, LinkedIn Post, Video

üîê 2. Add Required Credentials
Telegram Bot ü§ñ

OpenRouter AI üß†

Tavily API (for smart research) üìö

ElevenLabs üéôÔ∏è (for voice in videos)

PiAPI & Runway üéûÔ∏è (for faceless videos)

üß© 3. Link the Tools to the Agent Node
‚Äì Make sure the "Marketing Team Agent" is connected to each of the content creation tools as shown in the workflow.

üìé 4. Download Templates & Logs
üßæ Google Sheets Log Template (to track output)

üñºÔ∏è Creatomate Template (optional for enhanced image control ‚Äì shared in Skool group)

üìå Pro Tip: All detailed step-by-step setup instructions are included as sticky notes inside the n8n canvas. Just follow along!

parameters.name: createImage
parameters.description: Call this tool to create an image.

value.imageTitle: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('imageTitle', `The title of the image. Should be no more than 4 words.`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: editImage
parameters.description: Call this tool to edit an image.

value.image: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('image', `The title of the image the user wants to edit`, 'string') }}
value.request: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('request', `The edit the user wants to make to the image`, 'string') }}
value.pictureID: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('pictureID', `The ID of the image to edit`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: searchImages
parameters.description: Call this tool to search the image database.

value.intent: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('intent', `The intent of the user. This can either be "Get" or "Edit"`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: blogPost
parameters.description: Call this tool to create a blog post using a topic and a target audience.

parameters.name: linkedinPost
parameters.description: Call this tool to create a LinkedIn post using a topic and a target audience.

value.targetAudience: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('targetAudience', `The target audience of the LinkedIn post`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: Call this tool to create a video.

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are a marketing team AI agent. Your job is to help the user create and edit images based on the request, or create content.

## Tools
createImage - Use this to create an image. Send the requested image prompt to this tool.
editImage - Use this to edit an image. The user might also say "make" rather than "edit".
Image Database - Use this to search the image database. 
blogPost - Use this to create a blog post.
linkedinPost - Use this to create a LinkedIn post.
video - Use this tool to create a video.
Think - Use this if you need help making a decision.

## Instructions
- If the user asks to 'edit that image' or 'make that...', this indicates they want to edit the last image in the database, the most recent one.
- If the user requests a blog post or LinkedIn post, use the "blogPost" or "linkedinPost" tool and output: "Here's that post you requested. Hope you enjoy it."

## Output
- Make sure to return the image link as a clickable link

parameters.content:
# üìã Setup Guide  
**Author: [Muhammad Ashar Ishfaq(https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhammad-ashar-ishfaq/)**
---
### ‚úÖ First Steps
1. **Import the following workflows** into your n8n environment:
   - Video
   - LinkedIn Post
   - Blog Post
   - Create Image
   - Edit Image
   - Search Images

2. **Link all workflows** together appropriately.
   - Make sure that the tools the Marketing Team Agent uses are correctly linked to these workflows.
   - Rename workflows as needed to fit your naming system.
---

### üîó Credentials to Connect
- **[Telegram Credential](https://telegram.org/)** (for outbound/inbound communication)
- **[OpenRouter](https://openrouter.ai/) Credential** (for AI requests)
- **[Tavily](https://tavily.com/) Credential** (for research inside LinkedIn Post and Blog Post workflows)
---

### üîë API Keys to Configure
Inside the **Video Workflow**:
- **[PiAPI](https://piapi.ai/) API Key** (for video generation)
- **[Runway](https://runwayml.com/) API Key** (for video processing)
- **[ElevenLabs](https://elevenlabs.io/) API Key** (for voice generation)

Inside the **LinkedIn Post** and **Blog Post Workflows**:
- **[Tavily](https://tavily.com/) API Key** (for research assistance)
---

### üìÑ Templates to Download and Connect
- **[Creatomate](https://creatomate.com/) Image Template**  
  ‚Üí Download from the Free Skool Community

- **[Google Sheets Log Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wQxM9cAwewCigPH22KDidMu_i9j_dx4MHEa5rmJiw5I/edit?usp=sharing)**  
  ‚Üí Connect it to your n8n Google Sheets node to track content outputs.
---

Make sure all credentials, APIs, and templates are properly set before running the full system!

user.name: Muhammad Ashar
user.bio:
Hi There!
I help business owners and entrepreneurs ùêöùêÆùê≠ùê®ùê¶ùêöùê≠ùêû ùê≠ùê°ùêûùê¢ùê´ ùê®ùê©ùêûùê´ùêöùê≠ùê¢ùê®ùêßùê¨ using AI, smart workflows, and scalable systems‚Äîwithout needing a team of engineers.
